DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy study of Bromfenac Ophthalmic Solution in cataract surgery
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study of Bromfenac Ophthalmic Solution in Patients Undergoing Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Male or female at least 18 years of age who are scheduled for unilateral cataract surgery Have known hypersensitivity to bromfenac or to any component of the investigational product
DOC.keyword: Pain and Inflammation as a function of cataract surgery
